Posts.EditableText:
Does a global command automatically override the game commands?
For example with the speak command. A global command of
 '#text# with a printed msg of #@playerid# says, "#text# 
should override the Whoever:Hello correct?
Posts.HTML:
Does a global command automatically override the game commands?
For example with the speak command. A global command of
'#text# with a printed msg of #@playerid# says, "#text#
should override the Whoever:Hello correct?

Posts.EditableText: In theory that should be what happens, but in QuestNet Server 3.53 the default behaviour for speaking to other players always takes precedence. This will be changed in version 4.0.
Posts.HTML: In theory that should be what happens, but in QuestNet Server 3.53 the default behaviour for speaking to other players always takes precedence. This will be changed in version 4.0.

Posts.EditableText: roundabout figure how long until 4.0? Months? Years?
Posts.HTML: roundabout figure how long until 4.0? Months? Years?

Posts.EditableText: I'm hard at work on 4.0 at the moment - and I'm hoping to get the first beta version out within the next few weeks.
